attributes.action: Make all forms of 'geo-engineering' affecting the environment illegal.
attributes.additional_details: The Govt has 'declared Geo-Engineering essential to meet its climate targets'. We strongly counter this claim. People, animals, plants are being harmed; because the atmosphere in which they exist is being polluted on a daily basis by a cocktail of dangerous, chemicals and heavy metals they should NOT be exposed to. More importantly WE WERE NOT ASKED for our opinion nor permission to put our health at risk for the sake of a 'globalist' Net Zero agenda. NOR SHOULD OUR GOVERNMENT IMPOSE IT!
attributes.background: We believe neither the Government, nor anyone else, should be able to use technologies to intervene in the Earth’s natural weather systems. WE WANT ALL FORMS of 'GEO-ENGINEERING' on LAND, SEA & AIR in the UK BANNED.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Make all forms of 'geo-engineering' affecting the environment illegal
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701963
